welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mexico City, a vibrant metropolis known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and stunning architecture. We hope you enjoy exploring all the charm and beauty this city has to offer."

restaurants.name: El Cardenal
restaurants.description: El Cardenal is a mexican restaurant located in Ciudad de México.
restaurants.address: Palma 23, Centro Histórico, Ciudad de México (e/ 5 de Mayo y 16 de Septiembre), 06000 Ciudad de México, Distrito Federal

restaurants.name: Taquería El Gran Abanico
restaurants.description: Taquería El Gran Abanico is a taco restaurant located in Ciudad de México.

restaurants.name: Panadería Rosetta

restaurants.name: Pizza Roma
restaurants.description: Pizza Roma is a pizzeria located in Mexico City.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal dedicated to international flights and used by some domestic airlines as well.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
